title: Ranking matchmaking is broken.
body:
So i've come back to league of legends after about a 10 month break, played normals until I got back to my old skill level ( I was silver 4 last season, not a god but not too shabby at the game ). now I launch up a game of ranked and I seem to be getting put with players who are at a bronze 5 and even worse skill level, I stomp my lane every game but then when I roam there's a 12/0 bot lane adc. It's blatantly unfair and I'm unable to enjoy the game due to the constant afkers, feeders and trolls. please look into the matchmaking system riot and possibly change the algorithms so i'm matched with team mates with a similar skill level. thankyou. 

As you guys can see from the screenshots I have a half decent amount of farm each game (they all ended at 20 minutes), I had all those kills with 0 deaths every game but when people roamed I fell behind (the most recent game I just farmed and neither me or my lane opponent died). 

Don't bother replying if you're gonna say something like "you should of carried" "it's your fault" etc.

Please help me.

replies.body: Well Wuks it was meant to be technical support as there's an error in the elo system or matching system. Don't worry though nothing will ever change and the game will stay unplayable for some.

Hey 60FPS,


As this is the Help & Support sub-boards, we typically only answer general questions and technical issues related to League of Legends. As such, I'd like to direct you to post in the [**Gameplay **](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy)boards because this seems like a question regarding champion/game advice.
